meanings.definition: A picture made using a camera, in which an image is focused onto light-sensitive material and then made visible and permanent by chemical treatment.
meanings.sent1: I have many photographs of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She keeps her photographs in a special album.
meanings.sent3: The photographs on the wall always seem to be watching us.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the photograph lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph brought back memories of childhood.

meanings.definition: To take a photograph of (someone or something).
meanings.sent1: He photographs nature to capture its beauty.
meanings.sent2: She photographs weddings for a living.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally photographed my own shadow instead of the sunset.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a camera, photographing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The artist's eyes seemed to photograph every emotion in the room.
